statements: DELETE FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE user_id = 123 AND engagement_likes > 100
DELETE FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE post_date < '2022-01-01' AND engagement_comments < 10
DELETE FROM SocialMediaEngagement WHERE user_id = 456 AND engagement_shares > 50
DELETE FROM marketing_analysis WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
DELETE FROM social_media_engagement WHERE id IN (SELECT post_id FROM marketing_analysis WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale');
DELETE FROM social_media_engagement WHERE likes > 100 AND shares < 5
DELETE FROM Posts WHERE post_id = 'd34e68e1-7363-4583-ae31-3d747e395ae4' AND user_id = '5d83846f-416e-4c3b-b499-2f37f8231d65';
DELETE posts, comments FROM posts INNER JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE posts.likes_count < 10 AND comments.commenter_name = 'John'
DELETE engagements FROM engagements INNER JOIN posts ON engagements.post_id = posts.post_id WHERE posts.created_at < '2022-01-01'
